short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: To the wiki rabbit hole! Displays a random Wikipedia page based on shuffled languages of your choice.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
To the wiki rabbit hole! Redirects the current tab to a random Wikipedia page, based on shuffled languages of your choice. Ex. French Wikipedia (fr.wikipedia.org), Italian Wikipedia (ita.wikipedia.org), English Wikipedia (en.wikipedia.org, by default)... Don't forget to pin the rabbit!
